Message.Title: says it all...
Message.Msg: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eieOoUUl9RY

With 15 minutes remaining in the trading day and the Dow down 168, the WSJ put out a comment on its website that the Fed is about to ease. Rather than waiting until after the close, the WSJ decided to pump the market. Where is the SEC? Only decent posters respond. The trash can get lost.

With 15 minutes remaining in the trading day and the Dow down 168, the WSJ put out a comment on its website that the Fed is about to ease. Rather than waiting until after the close, the WSJ decided to pump the market. Where is the SEC? Only decent posters respond. The trash can get lost." Thanks hammie. Those of us without an ISP would be lost without you. Those other posters who make fun of you, "the trash", are just jealous of your tenacity which drives you to post even though your playing the fool. They don't know that you really are an investment Tyrannosaurus Rex who conceals his real investment intentions and plays the fool to throw the scallywags who torment you off the track. Keep the trash on their toes, hammie.
